game.name: My Little Pony Doctor
game.description:
You love playing with Pony during your free time. It is always amazing to spend time with this little and cute horse. However, today is not a good day for your beloved pony as she got injured while playing in the backyard of your home. Luckily, her caretaker is a doctor. It means that you have to play the role of a person who will take care of all her medical needs to heal her wounds. Join My Little Pony Doctor game and get ready to help her clean the wounds and get back to her normal life!

There is no need to bother as you have expertise in the doctoring field and has taken care of many patients as of now. Use the magical cream on all her affected areas and strap up her wounds as fast as you can in this doctor game for girls! She is fighting with a huge pain, so try not to waste your time anymore. Your dearest baby horse is really very sick and needs the quick attention from a medical practitioner on a priority basis. 

Start this girls game with removing the splinters and then come up with cleaning her wounds! Make sure to heal the little pony by following the instructions that will be shown on the screen on time to time. Interact, click and hold and then get ready to drag the medical tools and equipment using the mouse! There are five tools to explore and use to complete this html5 surgery game. Enjoy more doctoring simulation games for kids on atmegame.com and have fun to the fullest, no download required!
